visualization_prompt: Generate a Highcharts combination chart showing (1) a thematic map of Australia with regional economic activity indices and (2) a spline chart with monthly export trends, using SVG arrow annotations and synthetic data with seasonal patterns.
visualization_explanation: The visualization combines a 2D choropleth map (nominal geospatial data) with a temporal spline chart (interval-scaled time series). Synthetic economic indices (μ=65, σ=15) follow normal distribution across Australian territories, while export data shows seasonal trends with Q2-Q3 peaks (6.9-7.4B AUD) and November rebound (+7.5% MoM). The spline chart employs Tufte's data-ink maximization through minimal gridlines and direct value labels. Cairo's perceptual topology principles are maintained through distinct color saturation levels (map) vs. monochromatic temporal encoding (chart). Arrow annotations use preattentive processing for directional emphasis without legend dependency.
